articles.title: SA rowers have disappointing start but progress to repechage in Tokyo - News24
articles.description: South Africa's rowers had a disappointing start to their Olympic campaign as they finished last in both the men's pair and men's fours heats.
articles.content:

articles.description: South Africa vow to do their talking on the pitch after the Lions' Kiwi coach claimed his side had gained the upper hand in the set-piece battle.
articles.content:

articles.description: Some South Africans are not happy with South Africa's Olympic attire. Locals wondered out loud what Mr Price and the designers were thinking.

articles.title: Here Are Ways to Manage Cybersickness From Screentime - AllAfrica.com
articles.description: Cybersickness refers to a cluster of symptoms that occur in the absence of physical motion, similar to motion sickness. These symptoms fall into three categories: nausea, oculomotor issues and general disorientation. Oculomotor symptoms, like eye strain, fati…
